synopsis.text: Through the halls of Tenbi Academy, Takeru and his Security Committee team stand as the ultimate guardians against rogue Maken wielders causing chaos and mayhem. As they battle these malevolent forces, Takeru finds himself entangled in a web of romantic complexities with the captivating ladies of the committee. Amidst it all, the academy becomes a hotbed of peculiar events - from a bra-pinning pervert and a mystical feline transforming students into alluring vixens, to a cosplay festival where outfits inexplicably shrink to eye-popping proportions. With his unwavering focus on both the safety of his peers and their enchanting curves, Takeru navigates this whirlwind of magical mischief and amorous adventures in the thrilling continuation of Maken-Ki!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
